# Cloud Native Docs

## Architecting Cloud-Native .NET Apps for Azure

- [Architecting Cloud-Native .NET Apps for Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/index.md): A guide for building cloud-native applications leveraging containers, microservices, and serverless features of Azure.
- [Summary - Architecting cloud-native .NET apps for Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/summary.md): Learn the key conclusions about Cloud Native applications that are fully developed in the Architecting Cloud-Native .NET Apps for Azure guide/e-book.

## Cloud-native communication patterns

- [Cloud-native communication patterns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/communication-patterns.md): Learn about key service communication concerns in cloud-native applications
- [Front-end client communication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/front-end-communication.md): Learn how front-end clients communicate with cloud-native systems
- [Service to service communication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/service-to-service-communication.md): Learn how back-end cloud-native microservices communicate with other back-end microservices.
- [gRPC](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/grpc.md): Learn about gRPC, its role in cloud-native applications, and how it differs from HTTP RESTful communication.
- [Service Mesh communication infrastructure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/service-mesh-communication-infrastructure.md): Learn about how service mesh technologies streamline cloud-native microservice communication

## Cloud-native data patterns

- [Cloud-native data patterns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/distributed-data.md): Contrast data storage in monolithic and cloud-native applications.
- [Relational vs. NoSQL data](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/relational-vs-nosql-data.md): Learn about relational and NoSQL data in cloud-native applications
- [Caching in a cloud-native application](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/azure-caching.md): Learn about caching strategies in a cloud-native application.
- [Elasticsearch in Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/elastic-search-in-azure.md): Learn about adding Elastic Search capabilities to cloud-native applications.

## Cloud-native identity

- [Cloud-native identity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/identity.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Identity
- [Authentication and authorization in cloud-native apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/authentication-authorization.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Authentication and Authorization in Cloud Native Apps
- [Azure Active Directory](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/azure-active-directory.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Azure Active Directory
- [Identity Server](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/identity-server.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | IdentityServer

## Cloud-native resiliency

- [Cloud-native resiliency](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/resiliency.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Cloud Native Resiliency
- [Application resiliency patterns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/application-resiliency-patterns.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Application Resiliency Patterns
- [Cloud infrastructure resiliency with Azure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/infrastructure-resiliency-azure.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Cloud Infrastructure Resiliency with Azure
- [Resilient communication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/resilient-communications.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Resilient Communication

## Cloud-native security

- [Cloud-native security](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/security.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Security
- [Azure Security for cloud-native apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/azure-security.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Azure Security for Cloud Native Apps

## DevOps

- [DevOps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/devops.md): DevOps considerations for cloud-native applications
- [Feature flags](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/feature-flags.md): Implement feature flags in cloud-native applications leveraging Azure App Config
- [Infrastructure as Code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/infrastructure-as-code.md): Embracing Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with cloud-native applications
- [Cloud Native Application Bundles](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/cloud-native/application-bundles.md): Architecting Cloud Native .NET Apps for Azure | Cloud Native Application Bundles
